thread.title: The Summit Plummet May Be the Best Water Slide in the Country
thread.title_full: The Summit Plummet May Be the Best Water Slide in the Country

title: The Summit Plummet May Be the Best Water Slide in the Country
text:
The Summit Plummet May Be the Best Water Slide in the Country This super water slide at Blizzard Beach, takes riders up to speeds of 60 mph. iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
